summary: This bill, the Federal Cyber Workforce Training Act of 2025, mandates the National Cyber Director to create a plan for a Federal institute dedicated to cyber workforce development. The institute will provide training for both new and existing federal cyber personnel, focusing on upskilling and reskilling, and also train HR professionals. The plan, due within 180 days of enactment, must include curriculum details, organizational placement, funding estimates, and consider the use of existing resources, academic institutions and work-based learning. A briefing on the plan is required for congressional committees within 270 days. The bill specifies that no additional funds are authorized for this effort.
